scripts.deploy:dev: pnpm env:use:dev && pnpm cf:build && pnpm cf:deploy:dev
scripts.deploy:prod: pnpm env:use:prod && pnpm cf:build && pnpm cf:deploy:prod
scripts.db:link:dev: bash -lc 'set -a; source .env.production.dev; set +a; export SUPABASE_PROJECT_REF_DEV=$(echo $NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL | sed -E "s#https?://([^./]+)\..*#\1#"); pnpm supabase link --project-ref $SUPABASE_PROJECT_REF_DEV'
scripts.db:link:prod: bash -lc 'set -a; source .env.production.prod; set +a; export SUPABASE_PROJECT_REF_PROD=$(echo $NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL | sed -E "s#https?://([^./]+)\..*#\1#"); pnpm supabase link --project-ref $SUPABASE_PROJECT_REF_PROD'
